description: Hero grass-fed beef in this delicious steak recipe. Pair it with a fresh tomato salad, and you'll have a meal that's ready in 30 minutes.
name: Healthier Steak With Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
270g Macro Grass Fed Australian scotch fillet steak
2 Macro Organic gourmet tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
0.25 bunch Macro Organic kale, leaves roughly chopped, stems thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook quinoa according to packet instructions. Drain and cover to keep warm.

Meanwhile, heat 1 tbs oil in a medium frying pan over high heat. Season steak with pepper. Cook steak for 3 minutes on each side for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate. Cover loosely with foil and set aside for 5 minutes to rest. Thickly slice.
Whisk vinegar and remaining oil in a large bowl. Add quinoa, tomatoes, onion, kale leaves and stalks, and cheese. Season with pepper, then toss to combine.
Divide salad and quinoa among plates and top with steak. Serve.
